# Question 2

Trying 


```{python}
import plotly.graph_objs as go
from plotly.offline import plot


x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
y = [10, 14, 18, 24, 30]

trace = go.Scatter(
    x=x,
    y=y,
    mode='markers+lines',
    name='Data Points'
)

layout = go.Layout(
    title='Simple Scatter Plot',
    xaxis=dict(title='X Axis'),
    yaxis=dict(title='Y Axis')
)

fig = go.Figure(data=[trace], layout=layout)
plot(fig)

```
